titleStmt.title: Satans stratagems, or The Devils cabinet-councel discovered whereby he endevors [sic] to hinder the knowledg of the truth ... wherein is laid open an easie way to end controversies in matters of conscience ... together with arguments to each book ... / by Jacobus Acontius ... ; as also the testimonies of some ancient divines, together with an epistle written by Mr John Goodwin ; and Mr. Duries letter touching the same.
titleStmt.author: Aconcio, Iacopo, d. 1566.

titleStmt.title: Satans stratagems, or The Devils cabinet-councel discovered whereby he endevors [sic] to hinder the knowledg of the truth ... wherein is laid open an easie way to end controversies in matters of conscience ... together with arguments to each book ... / by Jacobus Acontius ... ; as also the testimonies of some ancient divines, together with an epistle written by Mr John Goodwin ; and Mr. Duries letter touching the same.
titleStmt.author: Aconcio, Iacopo, d. 1566.
Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.
Dury, John, 1596-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock, and are to be sold by G. Calvert,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, worn, and with print show-through.
